title: Steelers' Metcalf appears to punch fan during game
summary: Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver DK Metcalf is involved in an altercation with a Detroit Lions fan in the second quarter at Ford Field.

title: 'Still excited' - Lim, 71, the oldest flinger in town
summary: PDC World Championship history-maker Paul Lim, 71, discusses his longevity in darts as he prepares to face Luke Humphries at Alexandra Palace.

title: 'Incredible' Rice is 'future captain of England' - Rooney
summary: Former England forward Wayne Rooney hails Arsenal midfielder Declan Rice as a "future captain of England".

title: Stunning Rogers double secures Villa win over Man Utd
summary: Morgan Rogers scores twice for Aston Villa in their 2-1 win against Manchester United, extending Villa's unbeaten run to 10 matches in all competitions.

title: 30 models of the universe proved wrong by final data from groundbreaking cosmology telescope
summary: The Atacama Cosmology Telescope (ACT) in Chile has released its final batch of data after 15 years â€” and it proves that the Hubble tension, a rift in our understanding of the universe, is very real.

summary: Five millennia ago, ancient fishers buried a dog alongside a dagger in a lake bed. Archaeologists are trying to figure out why.
